Uses of Package
nom.tam.image.tile.operation

Packages that use nom.tam.image.tile.operation
Package
Description
nom.tam.image.compression.tile
(for internal use) Tile compression support for images and tables.
nom.tam.image.tile.operation
Interfaces and base classes for handling image tiles (primarily for internal use) .
  • Classes in nom.tam.image.tile.operation used by nom.tam.image.compression.tile
    Class
    Description
    AbstractTiledImageOperation
    A base implementation of 2D image tile compression.
    AbstractTileOperation
    (for internal use) A base implementation of parallel processing of tiles.
    ITiledImageOperation
    2D image tile compression interface.
    ITileOperation
    (for internal use) Interface for performing parallel operations on serialized 2D image tiles.
    TileArea
    The area represented by a 2D tile in an image, including its location inside the image and its size.
  • Classes in nom.tam.image.tile.operation used by nom.tam.image.tile.operation
    Class
    Description
    ITiledImageOperation
    2D image tile compression interface.
    ITileOperation
    (for internal use) Interface for performing parallel operations on serialized 2D image tiles.
    ITileOperationInitialisation
    (for internal use) Interface for initializing parallel operations on 2D image tiles.
    TileArea
    The area represented by a 2D tile in an image, including its location inside the image and its size.
